alert.note: Alert for Essex; Morris; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 11:08PM EDT until April 13 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Pine Brook affecting Morris, Essex, and Passaic Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Passaic River At Pine Brook. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, street flooding occurs in Fairfield including Camp Lane Road. Two Bridges Road is closed going into Lincoln Park and Wayne. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage on Wednesday. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (2 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Stg Time Date Passaic River Pine Brook 19.0 19.2 Tue 11 p 18.6 18.2 Crested &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued by 1000 AM EDT Wednesday.
